pattern-1.title: LIKE Pattern Matching (Basic)
pattern-1.sql:
SELECT
  product_name,
  unit_price
FROM products
WHERE product_name LIKE 'Ch%'
ORDER BY product_name;
pattern-1.description: Match products starting with "Ch" using % wildcard

pattern-2.title: LIKE with Multiple Patterns
pattern-2.sql:
SELECT
  product_name,
  category_id
FROM products
WHERE product_name LIKE '%sauce%'
   OR product_name LIKE '%cream%'
ORDER BY product_name;

pattern-3.title: LIKE with Underscore Wildcard
pattern-3.sql:
SELECT
  first_name,
  last_name
FROM employees
WHERE first_name LIKE 'J_hn'
ORDER BY last_name;
pattern-3.description: Match names like "John" using _ for single character

pattern-4.title: BETWEEN for Ranges
pattern-4.sql:
SELECT
  product_name,
  unit_price
FROM products
WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 10 AND 50
ORDER BY unit_price;
pattern-4.description: Find products with prices in the 10-50 range (inclusive)

pattern-5.title: BETWEEN with Dates
pattern-5.sql:
SELECT
  first_name || ' ' || last_name AS employee,
  hire_date,
  department
FROM employees
WHERE YEAR(hire_date) BETWEEN 2019 AND 2021
ORDER BY hire_date;
pattern-5.description: Filter employees hired between 2019-2021 using date functions

pattern-6.title: IN with List
pattern-6.sql:
SELECT
  product_name,
  category_id,
  unit_price
FROM products
WHERE category_id IN (1, 2, 3)
ORDER BY category_id, unit_price DESC;
pattern-6.description: Find products in specific categories using IN operator

pattern-7.title: IN with Subquery
pattern-7.sql:
SELECT
  product_name,
  unit_price
FROM products
WHERE category_id IN (
  SELECT category_id
  FROM categories
  WHERE category_name LIKE '%Bev%'
)
ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
pattern-7.description: Use IN with subquery to find products in Beverage categories

pattern-8.title: EXISTS with Correlated Subquery
pattern-8.sql:
SELECT
  c.category_name
FROM categories c
WHERE EXISTS (
  SELECT 1
  FROM products p
  WHERE p.category_id = c.category_id
    AND p.unit_price > 50
)
ORDER BY c.category_name;
pattern-8.description: Find categories that have expensive products (>$50)

pattern-9.title: NOT IN and NOT BETWEEN
pattern-9.sql:
SELECT
  product_name,
  unit_price
FROM products
WHERE unit_price NOT BETWEEN 10 AND 30
  AND category_id NOT IN (1, 2)
ORDER BY unit_price DESC
LIMIT 10;
pattern-9.description: Find products outside price range and excluded categories

pattern-10.title: Combining Predicates
pattern-10.sql:
SELECT
  product_name,
  category_id,
  unit_price,
  units_in_stock
FROM products
WHERE product_name LIKE 'C%'
  AND unit_price BETWEEN 5 AND 100
  AND category_id IN (1, 2, 3, 4)
  AND units_in_stock > 0
ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
pattern-10.description: Complex filtering using multiple predicates together

pattern-11.title: ALL Quantified Comparison
pattern-11.sql:
SELECT
  product_name,
  unit_price
FROM products p
WHERE unit_price > ALL (
  SELECT unit_price
  FROM products
  WHERE category_id = 1
)
ORDER BY unit_price DESC
LIMIT 5;
pattern-11.description: Find products more expensive than ALL category 1 products

pattern-12.title: ANY/SOME Quantified Comparison
pattern-12.sql:
SELECT
  product_name,
  unit_price,
  category_id
FROM products p
WHERE unit_price > ANY (
  SELECT AVG(unit_price)
  FROM products
  GROUP BY category_id
)
ORDER BY unit_price DESC
LIMIT 10;
pattern-12.description: Find products more expensive than ANY category average
